long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The best simplest to-do list for easy access in the browser.

ToDo tasks list is the best way to manage a to-do list in Chrome. Now it’s simple to check in with your most important todos or create a reminder or to-do list on the fly. Creating to-do lists is easier than ever — just click the button in your browser bar.

This extension lets you create tasks from any Chrome tab. 
This extension does not collect any data and does not have any access to your browser besides the data stored by the extension on your browser's local storage.

This project is open-source, you can find the code at Github in this repo -> https://github.com/Ismailco/Todo-Chrome-Extension
______________________________________________
 

FEATURES
 
- Create a task instantly
- Safe and easy to use
- Top tasks are a click away in the chrome bar
- Convenient task popup
- Sample and clean task list
- open-source

HELP & SUGGESTIONS

Contact me at https://ismailcourr.ml/#contact_section or open an issue in Github.
